Body: First day when I saw their news, website and their team members.. this ICO looked very promising.. and also at that time India had just 4-5 good exchanges..  But today.. India has almost 15 exchanges Both P2P and Money escrow modal along with wallets.. none of them had ICO. and despite backers such as McAfee why do they need to do ICO?... Just for gathering money and traffic?  So in order to ask questions before investing I took to their telegram group and posted below text.. twice getting banned and I could see people agreeing to my points..     I strongly discourage investing in their project. It's just another kind of sham ICO...  I have joined Bitcointalk just to post this.. ETH are better in your wallet than here...

Body: So just found out that BIT INDIA will not be listing on any other exchanges apart from etherdelta ( which is barley an exchange ) They claim the cost of getting listed is too much, this is not great news and if the token is not listed on other exchanges it will not gain popularity and traction.  Bit india burned about 94%(169,000,000) of their tokes as they wernt sold in the ICO.  Why didnt they just use some of these tokens to get listed on bigger exchanges?  Why did the development team not let us know about this decision of not being listed on bigger exchanges untill now?  Surley they didnt just find out about the fees and cost associated with getting listed on bigger exchanges they must have looked into before and they didnt let us know. This is clearly foul play.  Please let me know your thoughts/

Body: It's definitly not dimcoin 2.0. BitIndia is the most convienent and secure way to buy,sell and secure cryptocurrencies in India.As Bitcoin and other cryptocurrencies are expanding throught the world, India is the next largest crypto market. The country with a population of over 1.3 billion people, a Gross Domestic Product of more than $10 trillion, daily bank transactions of nearly $50 Billion has the highest amount of daily banking charges of around $5 Billion. Due to the high banking rates prevailing in the country, people are moving towards digital currencies such as bitcoin,ethereum and ripple which are purely decentralised and do not involve any third party institutions saving nearly $4 Billion a day.  BitIndia would add huge diversity to the existing banking system prevailing in the country.

Body: Bitindia Wallet- The Alpha explainer (Version-1)   https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2n9yxnRBnNQ   Bitindia launched the Alpha version of mobile app wallet on November 30, 2017.  The wallet currently supports Ethereum. Bitindia Wallet is a secure exchange wallet based on blockchain technology. It is going to be India's biggest exchange platform for cryptocurrency. It is a reorganized blockchain exchange wallet for the people of India to send and receive Bitcoins, Ethereum and other cryptocurrencies.  The mobile wallet will be able to store and make payments via digital currencies. Bitindia is trying to expand the user base by getting more and more people on the crypto exchange platform and by making them aware about the cryptocurrencies. It is offering a reliable and assured platform, for blockchain and digital currencies related to trade in India.

Body: Dear Investors and Interested parties, that's the point of BitIndia. First of all, I apologize that I was absent for a while longer. Now I am available for you as usual.  On the subject of marketing and advertising, there is only to say that not much emphasis is placed on it. BitIndia spreads automatically through propaganda and through Twitter, for example.  As has been recognized correctly, big hype also means that many people will push the price after launch. This is not our goal, our goal is to connect India to the Crypto phenomenon and start a huge project together.  Little communication does not mean that it is not a good project, but that people in the background work a lot  Gradually I will post more articles from our official telegram group.

Title: ðŸ’¥ðŸ’¥ðŸ’¥ðŸš€[ANN][PRE-SALE][ICO] BitIndia - Freedom is better - Exchange & WalletðŸš€ ðŸ’¥ðŸ’¥ðŸ’¥
Body: Everybody who thinks about investing in this project, please bear in mind my observations during the last weeks:  - I was very interested in the project (esp. because McAfee) and signed up for the newsletter on 25 September. Besides some news about "Meet our Founders in Dubai", I quickly received two e-mails stating that "BitIndia ICO is Live" with an Ethereum address in the e-mail - in contrast to that "only 200 ETH Minimum investments, please first register on our website"-mentality. I do not know whether BitIndia was hacked during that time, all I know is that all e-mails came from the same e-mail address ico@bitindia.co. --> E-Mails and Newsletter are either not aligned with overall strategy, or it is fraud and they hope to get some more tokens besides that "minimum 200 ETH" thing, or they are just incompetent to identify hacks and to clarify the danger in public  - In the e-mails, always a minimum of 200 ETH is stated, on the website it is 150 ETH --> incompetency  - When I first read into the project (must be 25. September) there were links to a Slack channel everywhere: bitindiaofficial.slack.com As I see Slack as the best communication tool I registered to find out, that it seems to be the second slack channel (as "BitIndia Official" stated that due to spam they opened a new one). However, it was completely empty, and only a few questions (the easiest ones) were answered by "Bitcoin Official". I asked them on Telegram whether they have a Slack channel and they said "No". I sent them the address and asked them to clarify whether this slack channel is official or not - they never did that. They also did not answer my questions about BitIndia on Telegram  - While Telegram is only a one-way communication channel with the developer alone (well, it was apparently, now they changed it and have 30 members) and the before-mentioned Slack channel is either official and empty or fake (and empty), they have a very big Facebook and Twitter community... think about that what you want.   Last but not least a list of questions of a Slack user, which I found quite interesting. I also sent these questions to BitIndia in their telegram channel, but they never answered:     I do not want to believe this is fraud (esp. with McAfee involved in it). However, the inconsistencies in communication, the lack of any fanbase on Slack / Telegram / Bitcointalk and the intransparent ICO details make me think that it is indeed either fraud (and McAfee fell for it) or a very, very incompetent team - both is very bad for any investments.

Your KYC was approved and your ethereum address has been added to our Ethereum contract. Now you can contribute.  NOTE:  1. MAKE SURE YOU ARE USING THE SAME ETHEREUM ADDRESS YOU MENTIONED IN THE KYC FORM 2. MAKE SURE GAS IS KEPT AT 400000 3. IF YOU SEND ETHEREUM FROM UNREGISTERED ADDRESS, IT WILL BE AUTONMATICALLY REJECTED BY OUR SMART CONTRACT, AND YOUR GAS WILL BE USED. 4. Make sure you use an ERC20 compatible wallet to send ETH.  If you tried to participate before this and the transaction was rejected, it was because your ethereum address was not added yet to the Bitindia contract.   Bitindia - Public Pre Sale Token Calculation Formula Explained Calculating the number of Tokens you will receive  You can contribute minimum 0.16666667 ETH using the registered Ethereum Address only   Official Ethereum Contract Address will be mentioned on our website only

Author: Easybitcoin2013
Title: ðŸ’¥ðŸ’¥ðŸ’¥ðŸš€[ANN][PRE-SALE][ICO] BitIndia - Freedom is better - Exchange & WalletðŸš€ ðŸ’¥ðŸ’¥ðŸ’¥
Body: Hello Bitindia Family,  We wanted to share quick updates on the Bitindia Wallet architecture and security aspects.  The Bitindia Wallet will have these features:  1. End-to-End Encrypted  All the sensitive user account data is stored in encrypted format on zero knowledge secure-storage, that makes the data hack proof, even team at Bitindia cannot access your wallet.  2. Encrypted Keystore backup  a. All the important encryption related to the security of user's cryptocurrency will happen on the client side b. BitIndia will not have access to the user private keys and since servers never know your private keys, your web browser or mobile devices encrypts or decrypts your keys on-demand using your passwords. c. It stores the wallet backups securely in an encrypted format on our servers to ensure you, that you can access your wallet from any of your different devices.  3. Multi Layer Security Unlike most of the wallets have only a single security layer to access the account, BitIndia wallet has multi-layered secured login mechanism. The users are required to create a login password which cannot be changed once created and further the users will be asked to set up a 2 factor authentication.  4. Transaction Password  Whenever a BitIndia wallet user wants to perform a transaction it can only be done by entering a transaction password which would be different from the login password. This would serve as an added layer of security in case where a user password is lost or stolen. The transaction will be initiated when both the transaction passwords along with the 2 Factor Authentications are entered.    5. Wallet Mnemonic  A nemonic is the passphrase seed of your BitIndia Wallet provided to you when you create a new wallet. The purpose of this is in case you need to recover your wallet at a later date, if you lose your login information. It is a secure account recovery mechanism  6. Secured Notification  If there any kind of changes to be performed in the BitIndia wallet such as changing the 2FA preference, resetting the transaction password etc. They can only be completed using the 2FA preference which may be a google authenticator app/ SMS OTP.

Title: ðŸ’¥ðŸ’¥ðŸ’¥ðŸš€[ANN][PRE-SALE][ICO] BitIndia - Freedom is better - Exchange & WalletðŸš€ ðŸ’¥ðŸ’¥ðŸ’¥
Body: ICO IS OVER  The ICO is over. Thanks for all investors, partners and friends.   BitIndia: A wallet and a crypto exchange for the streets of India. BitIndia is the most convienent and secure way to buy,sell and secure cryptocurrencies in India.As Bitcoin and other cryptocurrencies are expanding throught the world, India is the next largest crypto market. The country with a population of over 1.3 billion people, a Gross Domestic Product of more than $10 trillion, daily bank transactions of nearly $50 Billion has the highest amount of daily banking charges of around $5 Billion. Due to the high banking rates prevailing in the country, people are moving towards digital currencies such as bitcoin,ethereum and ripple which are purely decentralised and do not involve any third party institutions saving nearly $4 Billion a day. BitIndia would add huge diversity to the existing banking system prevailing in the country.  The BitIndia Wallet helps the users to buy and sell Bitcoin, Ethereum and Ripple with the help of the local currency. The Bitindia Exchangewould help the users to easily trade cryptocurrencies in the most secure and fastest platform ever designed. BitIndia has a team of the most experienced blockchain developers that are currently availble in the country and has the potential to develop the biggest cryptocurrency exchange in the world. BitIndia has completed its development for the BitIndia wallet and will be launching the largest cryptocurrency exchange in the world: BitIndia by the end of 2017.  BitIndia Tokens will be traded against bitcoin and other cryptocurrencies as well as fiat currencies in BitIndia and other exchanges throughout the world.  The BitIndia Pre Ico is launching on 1st September 2017.   Whitepaper  https://bitindia.co/whitepaper.pdf    Whitepaper Summary  https://bitindia.co/whitepaper-summary.pdf                          For any other information please visit: https://bitindia.co/  And subscribe to our social media channels:  Twitter: https://twitter.com/bitindia_co  Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCRWgE1HzkEsB38EcmK5tXkg  Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/BitIndia.co/  Telegram: https://t.me/bitindia  Join our official Telegram Public Announcement Channel for BitIndia  https://t.me/bitindiaofficial   more specs soon....
